name: transparent_body_skeleton_lora
description:
可以得到半透明以及黑色骨骼的效果，强烈建议只对二次元人物使用

It can get the effect of translucent and black bones.

Recommended to use it only for anime characters.

--

weight: 0.7-1.0

--

Recommended Prompts: transparent body,1girl,white skin, pale skin, skeleton, spine,

--

如果想要半透明皮肤，请添加一些描述身体的Prompt，例如： navel, breasts等

If you want semi transparent skin, please add some prompts that describe the body, such as: nevel, breasts, etc
